Thulsa's personal guards in the Ebon Tower are the Blood Legion, given immortality through Thulsa's necromancy.

Their life force is constantly renewed by artifacts called eternal hearts.

Destroy the Blood Legion and bring me their hearts. Without them, Thulsa can't bring them back.
Well done, <PCNAME>. We'll either find a way to destroy them, or the spirits of the Blood Legion can spend their eternal lives imprisoned.
Make sure you bring back the eternal heart of every Blood Legion soldier you kill. Otherwise, Thulsa can give them new bodies.
